medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Developed acute, constant upper abdominal pain around 5pm today after taking some juice, which has not improved with oxycodone at 1600. Pain increases with deep breaths. Incisional pain has been stable. Also presents with nausea and is unable to take fluids. Denies flatus or bowel movement since surgery.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism; Past surgical history includes LTCS, EUA, evacuation of hematometra, Bakri balloon and repair of cervical laceration.
